presentation.fsa
Class GraphView

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              presentation.fsa.GraphView
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable, FSAGraphSubscriber
Direct Known Subclasses:
GraphDrawingView
public class GraphView
extends javax.swing.JComponent
implements FSAGraphSubscriber

The visual display of an FSAGraph. Subscribes and response to change notifications from the underlying Publisher portion of the underlying graph layout model. Canvas can be scaled to display the graph at any size from full to thumbnail representation.

Author:
Helen Bretzke, Lenko Grigorov
See Also:
Serialized Form
